wikipedia_page.main: Steven Weisberg is a film editor who usually collaborates with director Alfonso Cuarón

response: Along with continuous changes in cinematographers, there have been five film editors to work in post-production on the series: Richard Francis-Bruce edited the first instalment, Peter Honess the second, Steven Weisberg the third, Mick Audsley the fourth, and Mark Day films five through eight.

link_mentions.page: List of film director and editor collaborations
response: * Alfonso Cuarón: Steven Weisberg (1995–2004), Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (2004).
